title: Mini Projects (Combined Concepts)
concept: Final level for C track. These problems combine loops, arrays, strings, functions, and basic logic to build small mini-project style solutions.

challenges.title: Simple Calculator (Loop)
challenges.description: Repeat reading a, b, op until op is q. For each op +, -, *, / print result on new line. When op is q, stop (no output).
challenges.inputDescription: Multiple lines of: a b op

challenges.title: Student Pass Count
challenges.description: Read N and N marks. Pass mark is 40. Print count of passed and failed students separated by space.

challenges.title: Matrix Row Sum
challenges.description: Read R, C and a RxC matrix. Print sum of each row on separate line.
challenges.inputDescription: R C, then R lines with C integers.
challenges.outputDescription: R lines each containing sum of that row.

challenges.title: Matrix Column Sum
challenges.description: Read R, C and matrix. Print sum of each column on new line.
challenges.outputDescription: C lines each containing sum of that column.

challenges.title: String Toggle Case
challenges.description: Given a string, toggle case of each alphabet (lower → upper, upper → lower).

challenges.title: Armstrong Number Check
challenges.description: Check if a number is Armstrong (sum of cubes of digits = number). Print Yes or No.

challenges.title: Binary to Decimal
challenges.description: Given a binary number as string (e.g., 1011), convert to decimal integer and print.

challenges.title: Decimal to Binary
challenges.description: Convert given decimal integer to binary (no leading zeros) and print.

challenges.title: Frequency of Digits
challenges.description: Read a non-negative integer n. Count frequency of each digit 0–9 and print 10 lines d:count.

challenges.title: Mini Report: Marks Analysis
challenges.description: Read N and marks of N students. Print highest, lowest and average on separate lines in this order.
challenges.outputDescription:
Line1: highest
Line2: lowest
Line3: average (integer division).
